=======================

- Github: [https://github.com/AndersonHJB/1v1-learning](https://github.com/AndersonHJB/1v1-learning)
- Pypi: [https://pypi.org/project/Code1v1/](https://pypi.org/project/Code1v1/)


## Installation

### MacOS

```bash
pip3 install Code1v1
```
### Windows

```bash
pip install Code1v1
```
